Title: Nelly & Monsieur Arnaud
Writer: Jacques Fieschi, Claude Sautet, Yves Ulmann
Actors: Emmanuelle Béart, Michel Serrault, Jean-Hugues Anglade, Claire Nadeau
Plot: When Nelly, a woman being just divorced, meets by chance M. Arnaud, a mature salesman just retired, begins a strange and special relationship between the two personalities.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 6 wins & 15 nominations.
Production: Cecchi Gori Group Tiger Cinema, Les Films Alain Sarde, TF1 Films Production, Prokino Filmproduktion [de]
